name: Focus-Bot
description:
Focus-Bot is a retro-style puzzle game of focus, where you must watch the numbers and gradually increase your highest score to compete with the best in the world.

Can you keep your zen-like focus long enough?

Simply set your speed, then start the simulator, when you see a number higher than your high score, stop the simulator before it changes and your new high score will be submitted to the global leaderboards, however if you miss that number and stop on a lower one, that will be your new high score.

For another challenge, try the 'Goal' mode, where you are given specific numbers of number ranges to look for.
